# leftCalloutOffset

**Instance Property**

The offset in points from the middle-left of the annotation view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var leftCalloutOffset: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property specifies where the map view shows the anchor of the callout when it orients off the left side of the annotation view.

## Managing callout views

- **accessoryOffset**: An offset that changes the accessory’s default anchor point.
- **canShowCallout**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the annotation view is able to display extra information in a callout.
- **leftCalloutAccessoryView**: The view to display on the left side of the standard callout.
- **rightCalloutAccessoryView**: The view to display on the right side of the standard callout.
- **detailCalloutAccessoryView**: The detail accessory view to use in the standard callout.
- **rightCalloutOffset**: The offset in points from the middle-right of the annotation view.
